resources.string:
Santa’s presents have gone missing, and
he needs your help to save Christmas!
Wander through the enchanted forest and
explore the magic castle while you
uncover missing presents.

 Scan all 6 presents to win a prize!

How to Play the Mystical Worlds Quest: 

The beauty of the Mystical Worlds thrives on the energy of It’s guests. Each of the four worlds contains two feature attractions with QR codes that can be charged by scanning them. Every time a barcode is scanned it helps sustain the beauty and magic of the Mystical Worlds. If you are able to find and charge all eight of the feature attractions the Aurora Elves will gift you a small prize for helping keep the Mystical Worlds energized and beautiful. The Prize Hut is located near the Mystical World’s exit.



How to Scan the Feature Attractions:

Once you’ve found a feature attraction, open up your scanner (on the previous page) click the QR code and point the camera towards the QR code below the attraction on the sign. Once you’ve successfully scanned a QR code, the feature attraction will change colour on your phone.

Note: Some features have multiple QR code stands with the same code to prevent overcrowding.
Scan all 6 codes to redeem a prize.
